createMosaic

public void createMosaic(java.lang.String[] srcImages,
                         java.lang.String mImage,
                         Parameters param)
Controls the flow of creating a mosaic. This assumes Images are already chosen.

Parameters:
srcImages - working set of images
mImage - the master image
param - the set of parameters for this mosaic

Creates a BufferedImage of the final mosaic from the input sources.

Parameters:

mImage - the master image
Returns:
the mosaic

findMatches

public Pixel[][] findMatches(int[][][] avgColors,
                             java.lang.String[] srcImages,
                             Parameters param)

Matches up segments in the master image with source images. This is the workhorse of the algorithm. It uses the notion of a score to try to find an acceptable match. Score is calculated as follows:

  • Take the difference between a source image's average red channel, and the segment's average red channel
  • Repeat for green and blue channels
  • Sum the absolute value of these differences

Parameters:
avgColors - a grid of average colors in the master
srcImages - a set of images to pool from
